title: Looking Back: Tech Fest 2023 Highlights
excerpt: A retrospective look at our most successful technical festival and its lasting impact.
paragraphs: Tech Fest 2023 was a landmark event that brought together students, faculty, and industry experts for three days of innovation and learning.
The festival featured over 50 events ranging from coding competitions to robotics challenges, attracting participants from colleges across the state.
One of the highlights was the keynote speech by a renowned AI researcher who shared insights about the future of machine learning in India.
The event also featured a startup pitch competition where student teams presented their innovative ideas to venture capitalists. Several projects received seed funding.
Looking back, Tech Fest 2023 set new standards for student engagement and continues to inspire current students to pursue excellence in technology.

images.caption: Winner team receiving their trophy from the chief guest.

title: Campus Transformation: A Journey Through 2022
excerpt: How our campus evolved through infrastructure improvements and community initiatives.
paragraphs: The year 2022 marked a significant period of transformation for our campus, with multiple infrastructure projects reaching completion.
The new library wing opened in March, doubling our seating capacity and introducing state-of-the-art digital resources for students.
A major initiative was the campus-wide Wi-Fi upgrade, providing high-speed internet access across all academic buildings and hostels.
The student-led green campus initiative planted over 500 trees and installed solar panels on three major buildings, reducing our carbon footprint significantly.
These changes have created a more conducive environment for learning and have positioned our institution as a model for sustainable campus development.

images.caption: The renovated library wing with modern study spaces.
Students installing solar panels as part of the green initiative.
